categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Rhyder Umatesh was a male Human soldier of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3630 BBY he was part of the forces brought by the Empress Acina to Iokath.
Rhyder Umatesh appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a vendor on Iokath for Imperial-affiliated players.
